trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of XHTML markup for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter"></xref> class to render to the page or control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 XHTML 標記類型<xref href="System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter"></xref>轉譯為頁面或控制項的類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: When you specify one of the Doctype enumeration values as the parameter in a <xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter.SetDocType%2A> method call, the value forces the text writer to adhere to the restrictions of that XHTML document type.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定其中一個文件類型列舉值中的參數為<xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter.SetDocType%2A>呼叫方法時，值會強制遵守該 XHTML 文件類型限制的文字寫入器。</xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter.SetDocType%2A>

trans-unit.source: XHTML Basic is the mobile version of XHTML 1.0 and supports the minimum number of XHTML modules to be an XHTML document.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 基本行動版的 XHTML 1.0 而且支援 XHTML 模組是 XHTML 文件的最小數目。

trans-unit.source: It is designed for clients that do not support the full set of XHTML features, such as mobile phones, personal digital assistants (PDAs), pagers, and set-top boxes.
trans-unit.target: 它被針對不支援一組完整的 XHTML 功能，例如行動電話、 個人數位助理 (Pda)、 呼叫器和盒的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: With XHTML Basic, a document can be presented on the maximum number of clients, including a wide range of mobile phones with different display formats and presentation capabilities.
trans-unit.target: XHTML basic 文件可以呈現在用戶端，包括各種使用不同的顯示格式與簡報功能的行動電話的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: XHTML Mobile Profile adds several additional elements and attributes to XHTML Basic from the full XHTML 1.0, including additional presentation elements and support for internal style sheets.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 行動設定檔新增數個其他項目或屬性到 XHTML 基本從完整的 XHTML 1.0，包括其他簡報項目和內部的樣式表的支援。

trans-unit.source: Wireless Markup Language (WML) 2.0 expands on both XHTML Basic and XHTML Mobile Profile by providing support for cascading style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 無線標記語言 (WML) 2.0 會展開 XHTML 基本和 XHTML 行動設定檔由提供階層式樣式表的支援。

trans-unit.source: This format does not support frames and styles.
trans-unit.target: 此格式不支援框架和樣式。
XHTML 行動設定檔的格式。
